column4: i know that gaim has yahoo , but its old and out of date how would i eaither update it or install yahoo messenger
Hey anyone know how to install yahoo messenger i know gaim has it i tried following some directions i found but they didnt work (the version for debain
are you trying to log in to the yahoo messenger network with GAIM?
there is a newer version of GAIM, but I wouldn't know how to install that other than downloading and compiling from source. You'd have to remove the old version of GAIM first though
you can download the Yahoo Messenger for Unix at the yahoo website, let me get you the URL
how did you install the version that you downloaded?
how did you install though? like specifically
have you removed the package yet?
if you followed the directions the package is on the system, but you will need to open a terminal and type sudo apt-get -f upgrade
this will download the remaining packages needed to run the program
in the terminal window
what does it say or what happens?
after you type in sudo apt-get -f upgrade
you see, when you download the .deb file from yahoo, it doesn't come with all the software to run, so after you run sudo dpkg -i ymessenger*.deb, it will not run due to missing dependencies
so that why after the dpkg -i, you need to run sudo apt-get -f upgrade
like that, it downloads the rest of the stuff it needs
yes, from there you can log in and run those commands
i'm not sure why your terminal is acting up, but if you search the ubuntuforums.org, i think i remember seeing other people with problems like that
that still isnt working
what happened? anything? error messages?
go to synaptic and search for it, see if you can find something by the name of libssl (leave out the version number)
did it work?
oh ok.
